Package com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.action

Contains classes-controllers for general actions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionManager
    Incapsulate contorls for command, request and response for next servlet or/and jsp.
    ActionManagerFactory
    Provides access action-classes to service-layer classes(throught service factory) for interact Controller with model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    This class incapsulate requested action, which matches URI, requested by front-end.
    Action.Forward
    This class incapsulate passing controls between servlets and/or jsp.
    ActionManagerFactoryImpl
    Provides access action-classes to service-layer classes(throught service factory) for interact Controller with model.
    ActionManagerImpl
    Provides processing actions and transfer attributes between servlets.
    AuthorizedUserAction
    Incapsulate permitted actions for administrator.
    HorseListAction
    Process requred data for formation information about horses.
    LoginAction
    Authentication and authorization user.
    LogoutAction
    Logging out user from web-app.
    MainAction
    Provides appropriate main action for each user based his role.
    MenuItem
    Represent available pages for user.
    ProfileEditAction
    Forwarding user to page for edit his personal data.
    ProfileSaveAction
    Process user's input for change his personal data.
    RegistrationAction
    Forward user to registration page.
    RegistrationSaveAction
    Process input data for create new user.

Package com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.action Description

Contains classes-controllers for general actions.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alexey Kardychko
